items.description: Activation paramters for sender with id 'id'
ID of a device to be activated

mode.description: mode of activation: immediate (on message rx), scheduled_absolute (when internal clock >= requested_time), scheduled_relative (when internal clock >= time of message rx + requested_time), activate_none (removes the currently scheduled activation)

requested_time.description: String formatted TAI timestamp (<seconds>:<nanoseconds>) indicating time (absolute or relative) for activation
